directions: Heat oil in a 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add onion to the hot oil and saute for about 1 minute. Add carrots, green beans, mushrooms, and bell pepper. Cook and stir for 3 to 4 minutes.

Stir riced cauliflower, garlic, turmeric, paprika, curry powder, salt, and pepper into the skillet. Continue cooking and stirring over medium heat until vegetables reach desired texture, about 5 minutes.
Serve warm garnished with almonds and parsley.
ingredients: ¼ cup thinly sliced red bell pepper
⅛ teaspoon curry powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch chopped fresh parsley, or to taste  (Optional)
title: Golden Cauliflower Rice with Garden Vegetables
